name: Lakeside Holiday Apartments

reviews.title: Beautiful new self-contained apartments near the river
reviews.text: Almost new 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartments walking distance to the Murray River. Beautiful apartments with excellent facilities and friendly staff. We;'ll be back.

description: Welcome to the private yet vibrant holiday accommodation that is Lakeside Holiday Apartments. Ideally situated beside an ornamental lake and only a short stroll from the Murray River, Lakeside Holiday Apartments presents the perfect choice for those seeking relaxation in quality accommodation.Our beautifully appointed, fully furnished 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartments with kitchen and laundry, are complemented by our on site facilities including swimming pool, use of nearby tennis court, barbeque/entertaining area and Cabana.
